Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.card_management_system.controller.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
REST Controller provides administrative endpoints for managing users and cards, including card creation, activation/blocking, transaction retrieval, and user limit settings. All endpoints are prefixed with "/api/admin".

    • AdminController

      public AdminController(UserService userService, CardService cardService, TransactionService transactionService)
      Constructs an AdminController with the given services.
      Parameters:
      userService - service for managing users
      cardService - service for managing cards
      transactionService - service for managing transactions

  • Method Details

    • getAllCards

      @GetMapping("/cards") public List<CardDto> getAllCards()
      Retrieves all cards in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of CardDto objects

    • createCard

      @PostMapping("/cards/create") public CardDto createCard(@RequestBody CardDto cardDto) throws Exception
      Creates a new card for a user.
      Parameters:
      cardDto - data of the card to be created
      Returns:
      the created CardDto with masked card number
      Throws:
      Exception - if encryption fails

    • getCardTransactions

      @GetMapping("/cards/{id}/transactions") public List<TransactionDto> getCardTransactions(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves all transactions for a specific card.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card
      Returns:
      a list of TransactionDto objects

    • blockCard

      @PostMapping("/cards/{id}/block") public Card blockCard(@PathVariable Long id)
      Blocks the card with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to block
      Returns:
      the updated Card object with BLOCKED status

    • activateCard

      @PostMapping("/cards/{id}/activate") public Card activateCard(@PathVariable Long id)
      Activates the card with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to activate
      Returns:
      the updated Card object with ACTIVE status

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public List<UserDto> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects

    • createUser

      @PostMapping("/users/create") public UserDto createUser(@RequestBody UserDto userDto)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      userDto - the data of the user to create
      Returns:
      the created UserDto

    • setUserLimit

      @PostMapping("/users/{id}/limit/{limit}") public void setUserLimit(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable Long limit)
      Sets a monthly limit for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      limit - the monthly limit to set
